br.span: Update from Department of Education - CLICK HERE

br.br:
**The Governor has announced that distance learning will continue through the end of the regularschool year. We thank you for your assistance and support in this effortand ask that you continue to work with us as we provide an education to your children.
***El Gobernador ha anunciado que la educacin a distancia continuar hasta el final del ao escolar regular. Les agradecemos su ayuda y apoyo en este esfuerzo y le pedimos que continen trabajando con nosotros mientras brindamos educacin a sus hijos.

div.span: -LPGE School meals are available for any child 18 years and younger.

span.span: Please be advised that during the school closure, only school staff and children who have been approved for child care services will be allowed to enter either school building. Students and the general public are not allowed in the building from March 18th through May 1st.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; white-space: pre-wrap; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The LPGE Schools are offering an Academic Intervention Hotline for students and parents that need assistance in completing online homework and coursework during the COVID 19 school closure.

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The Hotline is staffed by certified LPGE teachers. The hotline is designed to assist both elementary and high school students beyond the online school day.

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Hours of service: 4:00 pm to 7:30 pm on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; letter-spacing: normal;

div.a: Read More... about Register to Attend LPGE Schools

span.style: font-size: 11px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: Long Prairie-Grey Eagle Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment. If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting the District at (320) 732-4641 or by e-mail at tcebulla@lpge.k12.mn.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act or Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act, you may contact Superintendent Kringen at jkringen@lpge.k12.mn.us.

span.style: background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); font-family: Asap, sans-serif; color: rgb(44, 44, 44);

br.span: The mission of the Long Prairie-Grey Eagle School District, as an innovative progressive leader in education, is to ensure that every student is a confident, responsible global citizen with a passion for learning. This will be accomplished through: state of the art facilities, dynamic positive relationships and a rigorous engaging curriculum, in partnership with parents and the community.

div.h3: Long Prairie Grey Eagle School District
